vsParam:
Huh, w, where is this place?
I can't be inside the "Mysterious Painting"?

Yah!? Ah, there's someone here!?
I, I am sorry!
My name is Lydie, I am an alchemist...

I run an atelier in "Merveille"
with Sue... Ah, my twin sister.

Wow, you run an atelier!
Does this mean you are a very powerful alchemist?

Ah, no... Although our goal is to become "the kingdom's
top-class atelier", we still have a long way to go...

"The kingdom's top-class atelier"!
Ho ho, that's an ambitious goal.

T, thank you...
But just as I said, I am not experienced enough...

So, I run it with Sue... Uh?
Sue? Where are you!?

Um...
I am sorry, but your sister isn't here...

Oh... I see...
Will Sue be okay...

Lydie.
Would you like to... live here for some time?

This is the "Academy",
you can learn many things here, including academy!
So, you can train yourself here while patiently waiting...

Perhaps Sue would come here?
Uh... Indeed, this seems to be the best option...

Yeah, I also suggest you to stay here.
After all, we are still studying the way to send you back.

Ah ha ha... So,
can I stay here for a while?
